name: Drinking Tea (with the Trans Boy You Secretly Have a Crush On)
name_original: Drinking Tea (with the Trans Boy You Secretly Have a Crush On)
description:
You are Milo Poppydash, student at the prestigious Halfmoon Academy for Witches.  Your best friend is Atlas Galecrown, fellow student at the Academy.  You have a crush on him.

Atlas finally asked you out!  Only problem is you immediately embarrassed yourself and now you can never face him again or die of shame.

Your only option?  Steal the Time Acorn, go back in time, and relive the day until Atlas asks you out again!

Drinking Tea (with the Trans Boy You Secretly Have a Crush On) includes:
⏰ Ill-advised time travel!
🐸 A Frog!
🖌️ Cute and cozy art!
🧙‍♀️ Oops, my finger slipped and I made it about witches!

Drinking Tea (with the Trans Boy You Secretly Have a Crush On) is made by clover.  They are an idiot who likes Promare (2019) too much and makes games.  Special thanks to the rest of the tiny games to make magic with creators!

This game was created for the tiny games bundle!  The bundle's goal is to encourage support for the creators of small games so that we can continue to make more tiny games.  Even the tiniest of games are the result of a lot of love and dedication!
